section.name: Configurating Magnolia
section.p: One of the first things you want to start to configure is "Activation". Activation means setting up the process to push content from one repository to the other.

Before starting to configure "Activation", it is important to understand the concept of instances, which is an essentual part of Magnolia. So start by reading 'Concept of Instances'. This should help you answer questions like "Why aren't my Web pages online?" and similar.
